content: **details** * this pattern is available in both english & russian both versions will be added to your library after purchase * pattern consists of 37 rounds * level is intermediate * stitches/terms slip_stitch skip chain single_crochet double_crochet csdc beginning shell shell shell space dtr beginning decrease decrease dc3tog picot * there is a complete photo-tutorial included as a separate pdf showing each round -------------------------------- *join our discussion and support group for emilyandthe designs on facebook https //www facebook com/groups/878254922303627/*
